COMMENTS FOR PRECONFIGURATIONS JSON FOR: Test_Scope -- Web or Mobile ## Web - To execute tests on Web Browsers ## Mobile - To execute tests on Mobile APPS and Browsers
Capture_Screenshot_on_Failure_Only -- Yes or No #### No - It will capture screenshot for all steps. ## Yes - It will capture screenshot only for failures.
To_start_Selenium_and_Appium_Servers_automatically -- Yes or No #### Yes -> will start the Selenium hub and Appium Servers #### No -> will not start the Selenium hub and Appium Servers.
